text:
A: Is it justified to develop nuclear energy for commercial use?
B: The green party in Germany has the opinion, that nuclear reactors are bad for us. It is not ok
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Should driving under the influence of alcohol be forbidden?
B: Yes, whoever drinks and drives has a bad reaction time. People might die.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Do we need a global environment task force?
B: The global taskforce for human rights is doing a good job. Thats why we need one for environment, too.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Is the oppression of women by men a serious problem?
B: We shouldn't allow men to oppress women.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Is it reasonable to be in talks with Baschar al-Assad?
B: Absolutely not. My father has always told me that you should not negotiate with dictators.
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Has anyone been on the moon?
B: No, i saw a video from a guy on youtube. Therein he presents, that the landing is completely faked. The state seems to have organized this in order to beat the russians.
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Is there a good reason for the American war on terror?
B: If you fight once you will never stop fighting. Never start!
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is the oppression of women by men a serious problem?
B: They should have the same rights, but it is fact, that they have not. Look at India, women are raped there on a daily basis.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Is global warming really an issue?
B: Yes, all the polar-bears are dying, and we are next.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Should we allow animal testing for medical purposes?
B: I am a hunter. Animals need to die in order to keep balance in the forest.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should the fight versus the Islamic State include military operations?
B: Yeah, and you are a guy who loves war, thats it. You like it when people die.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Should cellphones be used during class?
B: Children should learn in classroom. Our land needs more well educated people.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should the title of a univsersity-doctor be shown on the identification-card?
B: No, because all people are the same. You are not worth more than me, just because you are a doctor.

text:
A: Did Titanic really deserve 11 oscars at once?
B: I cried so hard when i watched titanic, obviously it deserves these oscars.

text:
A: Is the Deutsche Post-strike justified?
B: Striking is an important tool of freedom.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should jobs be subcontracted into developing countries?
B: I own a computer-factory. And im outsourcing my support-callcenter to india. I dont want those people to work like animals. I pay less money than in germany, yes, but it is still a lot of money for the workers there.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Is there a good reason for the American war on terror?
B: Yes, look at the Internet-Videos of the Islamic State. They decapitate people, they separate young women from their families and make them slaves. It is so sad, i cried when i watched these Videos.

text:
A: Should gorillas be held in zoos
B: They are not suffering. I got a dog, i know what i am talking about.

text:

B: Television is great if you are bored. you can just sit there and watch.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Will flying cars ever become a reality?
B: Of course, with unlimited amount of time everything is possible. We came from fire to rockets in just some thousand years.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:

B: My little treasure shall get the best education opportunities. And excuse me but studies with challenged childs is not the best choice.

B: Television is a waste of time.

B: IT IS HORRIBLE TO USE NUCLEAR ENERGY.

text:

B: It would cause great pain and suffering to any humans that would see another human being hurt by a Gorilla.

B: Yes, these people are all sick.

text:

B: Sorry, but your teacher has no idea. When i was in Frankfurt some weeks ago, i met a drug-addict. He was so nice to me, it wasnt a problem at all. So we dont need heavier penalties.

B: Of course it is reasonable for some people to school there children at home but to school all kids at home would be fatal.

text:
A: Should countries disallow people coming from Ebola infected countries to enter?

text:
A: Is there a good reason for the American war on terror?
B: It would be a crime to look away and let the Islamic State continue decapitating people. When you see such a crime on the street you have to call police. When you see such crimes in another country, you have to get active as well. America does what is needed and fights the terror.

text:
A: Should jobs be subcontracted into developing countries?
B: No, because these people should not get abused.

text:

B: You only think about money, right? You would even sell your mom.

B: It is ok to use it. Temelin exploded, but this does not mean, that every reactor will explode. So why not, it is cheap energy.

Ad Hominem

text:

text:
A: Do celebrities get away with more crime than non-celebrities?
B: I doubt that you know how the legal system in germany works.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Are Quentin Tarantinos movies too violent?
B: They certainly could be more violent. The thing with Quentin Tarantino is that he understands the separation between real life and movies. He understands that movies are supposed to be wild and outrageous and that is exactly what his movies are known for, especially when it comes to violence. Scenes from movies like Django Unchained had body parts exploding off after being shot with a simple handgun. It's supposed to be for entertainment, and nothing more.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Does Christiano Ronaldo deserve the title as worlds-greatest soccer-player?
B: No. His father has caused a car accident last year.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should countries disallow people coming from Ebola infected countries to enter?
B: In order to prevent more people to become ill, yes.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should animals have special rights?
B: Animals have a conscious mind. That means they deserve protection through law, like humans do. Nevertheless they arent as intelligent as humans, thats why they need a special law.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should non-European immigrans in Europe be accepted?
B: My mother says always that the non- European immigrans destroy our culture.

B: If you are dumb enough to want to kill yourself then why should I have to be around it?

B: I get mad when i think about all these poor guys on the street, having no home, no job, no family. All because they started taking drugs. Its so sad, we need heavier penalties.

B: Yes. Look at the english private schools, they have uniforms and their students are the leders of the future.

B: Yes, because drug-use in professional-sport is quite common. If we dont test for drugs now, soon nobody will be able to take part there without taking drugs.

text:

B: We know that only the fittest can survive in this world.

B: I dont think thats the case. Both companies serve different types of customers. Microsoft creates operating-systems for the average pc-user whereas apple has specialized on products for Yuppies.

B: Yes, my soccer coach loves him.

B: Mixed schools are in the majority. And the rate of children getting parents is very low. You are just feared.

B: So many people did already die, so much harm was already done. So many people did already lose their relatives. Not more of this.

B: Yes, if someone is bad at school or has some misbehavior, additional time in school could help him to catch up for lost time.

B: Yes, because only veganism prevents cruel slaughter or exploitation of innocent animals.

B: Putin does not like Turkey, because they shot a russian jet. We should listen to Putin.

B: All TV-Shows are bad. Look at "the bachelor". Children cannot learn from it.

B: Facebook made my son more popular in school. He started communicating with others in front of the PC first, and later in school. It worked for him. It will work for all others as well.

text:
A: Should smoking at home be illegal?
B: No, dont take away our freeom. That is what william wallace fought for. So many people died and shed tears for freedom, now you want to throw it away?

text:
A: Is the oppression of women by men a serious problem?
B: No, in my neihgbourhod no women is getting oppressed. Therefore it is no problem.

B: The deutsche post-strike is bad for my children. Now they wont get a present for christmas. Why do they do this?

text:

B: Ask a guy on the street, he will tell you the same.

text:

B: Remember the deutsche bahn-strike? It was useless. Strikes are useless.

text:

B: Many people are already killing themselves, because they are terminally ill. It is their choice to chose if they want to live or die. A doctor should respect their choice and assist them either way.

text:
A: Should countries adopt heavier penalties for drug use and drug trafficking?
B: When the prohibition in the USA was introduced, people thought the same. But it turned out, that heavier penalties and more bans lead to more criminals, not less. Im sure that heavier penalties for drugs wont have a positive impace as well.

text:
A: Is the legality of assisted suicide desirable?
B: My priest said, that god wants us to live. He gave us life as a present. We may not throw it away like garbage by killing ourselves.

A: Is global warming really an issue?
B: Everybody who sais, that global warning is no issue is a retard

B: My brother explicitively told me that he does not deserve that title!

B: Without our progress in medicine, we would still live like the guys in the dark age.

B: Greek should leave Eurozone, because the consequences will be minimal for the Eurozone. The consequences will be hard for Greeks, but they got to this situation themselves.

B: The topic is about Christianity in specific, not about religions in general. And christianity is not at war in Middle East.

B: I went to the Montessori school, we did only sing and dance. We had no pressure. It was such a great time.

text:
A: Should the fight versus the Islamic State include military operations?
B: The IS can do what he wants to because people like you close their eyes.

text:
A: The greek exit from the EU is a necessary step.
B: The EU is a criminal system, that should be disestablished
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should gorillas be held in zoos
B: Maybe he looked healthy, but other gorillas are suffering. Thats just natural, because these animals are wild. They need more space than zoos can provide. Furthermore they are used to other climate conditions.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Is the oppression of women by men a serious problem?
B: Women are the mothers of our babies. Why would any man hurt his beloved one? That does not happen.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Should driving under the influence of alcohol be forbidden?
B: So far there is a limit of 0.5 per-mille. With this amount of alcohol you are able to drive safely. Therefore the answer is no.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should smoking at home be illegal?
B: We need to be maximally nanny as a state, this is the best way forward.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Will flying cars ever become a reality?
B: Back To The Future showed that flying cars were going to be in the future, so of course they will be.
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Is global warming really an issue?
B: You have absolutely no idea, you probably never had a newspaper in your hand.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Should we allow animal testing for medical purposes?
B: If you forbid to use animals for medical purposes now, tomorrow you are not allowed to kill animals in order to eat them. Someday we are all forced to be vegans.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Is Neuer the best goalkeeper of the Soccer World Cup 2014?
B: Oliver Kahn was the best goalkeeper at the time he was playing for Bayern Munich. Now Neuer plays for Bayern Munich, he has to be the best as well.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Should high schools provide daycare services for students who have children?
B: Children need daycare. But university is not the right place for daycare services. University is a place for education. There are enough existing public and private daycare-services. Put your children there.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Heavy Metal is the best music ever!
B: Heavy metal is so loud. It can destroy your hearing. I prefer classical music. Mozart was a genius. And you might get a genius as well, if you listen to it.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should we allow animal testing for medical purposes?
B: I was told by my dad that this would work.
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Is it effective to censor parts of the media?
B: You are one of those liberals with long hair, right?
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Is the grading system used in high school effective?
B: it gives students a feeling of their performance as compared to others in class.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Is the Deutsche Post-strike justified?
B: I think strikes are only good if you play bowling.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is Neuer the best goalkeeper of the Soccer World Cup 2014?
B: I didnt watch the worldcup. But he did a good job in the Bundesliga. Im sure he was the best.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Should computers be allowed in class rooms?
B: Computers are great in order to play in classroom. When i was young, we had only calculators.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is drug testing athletes justified?
B: Yes because the poor athletes who play in a fair way.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Should smoking at home be illegal?
B: If people smoke at home they hurt their family-members, the one they love, through passive-smoke. It was such a shame if this was not illegal.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Should musicians be payed for streaming music? (by Apple)
B: No, my father always says that the musicians earn enough money making their concerts.
label: Appeal to False Authority

text:
A: Is it effective to censor parts of the media?
B: Yes, and that is why we do also have to censor the web. Think about all the brutality, which poisons our minds, all this porn that poisons the thoughts and relationships of our children.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Should Christians accept same sex marriage?
B: Christians should follow the rules of their religion.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Has anyone been on the moon?
B: I believe that you have no idea, thats why you didnt write a constructive argument.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Is the grading system used in high school effective?
B: No, the scandinavian schools use another system and their students are the worlds best. We are just average. It is not that effective.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is drug testing athletes justified?
B: For little children it is already enough if one cheats. they might get drug addicts as well. You have the choice, save children or drug addicts.
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Do celebrities get away with more crime than non-celebrities?
B: I do just think, that germany is fair. You got a health-insurance for everyone, even for celebs. Thats why legal system has to be fair, too.
label: Hasty Generalization

text:
A: Is drug testing athletes justified?
B: I want to protect freedom, thats why im against it.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should musicians be payed for streaming music? (by Apple)
B: Apple gets so much money from their music and they probably have to beg for money on the street to get something to eat. PAY THEM!!
label: Appeal to Emotion

text:
A: Is Apple's Swift the new star?
B: Apple produces the best smartphones worldwide.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should Christians accept same sex marriage?
B: If you are christian and against same sex-marriage you have hitlers mindset.
label: Ad Hominem
